## [VideoItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/video-item)

### Methods

|                                                         Method                                                          |                                    Return type                                    |                                                                                                                                                                               Brief description                                                                                                                                                                               |
|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| [duplicate()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/video-item#duplicate())                         | [VideoItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/video-item) | Creates a copy of this item and appends it to the end of the form.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| [getAlignment()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/video-item#getAlignment())                   | [Alignment](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/alignment)  | Gets the video's horizontal alignment.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| [getHelpText()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/video-item#getHelpText())                     | `String`                                                                          | Gets the item's help text (sometimes called description text for layout items like [ImageItems](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/image-item), [PageBreakItems](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/page-break-item), and [SectionHeaderItems](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/section-header-item)). |
| [getId()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/video-item#getId())                                 | `Integer`                                                                         | Gets the item's unique identifier.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| [getIndex()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/video-item#getIndex())                           | `Integer`                                                                         | Gets the index of the item among all the items in the form.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| [getTitle()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/video-item#getTitle())                           | `String`                                                                          | Gets the item's title (sometimes called header text, in the case of a [SectionHeaderItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/section-header-item)).                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| [getType()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/video-item#getType())                             | [ItemType](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/item-type)   | Gets the item's type, represented as an [ItemType](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/item-type).                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| [getWidth()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/video-item#getWidth())                           | `Integer`                                                                         | Gets the video's width in pixels.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| [setAlignment(alignment)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/video-item#setAlignment(Alignment)) | [VideoItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/video-item) | Sets the video's horizontal alignment.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| [setHelpText(text)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/video-item#setHelpText(String))           | [VideoItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/video-item) | Sets the item's help text (sometimes called description text for layout items like [ImageItems](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/image-item), [PageBreakItems](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/page-break-item), and [SectionHeaderItems](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/section-header-item)). |
| [setTitle(title)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/video-item#setTitle(String))                | [VideoItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/video-item) | Sets the item's title (sometimes called header text, in the case of a [SectionHeaderItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/section-header-item)).                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| [setVideoUrl(youtubeUrl)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/video-item#setVideoUrl(String))     | [VideoItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/video-item) | Sets the video itself from a given YouTube URL or YouTube video ID.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| [setWidth(width)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/video-item#setWidth(Integer))               | [VideoItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/video-item) | Sets the video's width in pixels.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
